name: Pharmacist .com.pk
description: A web and mobile application that suggests alternate medication for the provided brand or generic name of the medicine (only Pakistani products). Also provides the feature to locate a nearby pharmacy that has the required medicine available in their stock. It also provided a special interface for pharmaceutical companies and pharmacies to manage their products, stocks, and branches.
role: Worked as full-stack developer developing separate ASP.NET MVC and Web API servers. Used jQuery as the primary front-end development tool along with Datatables
Implemented custom Claim Based Authorization along with token-based authentication for the Android application and Web API communication
Worked on various data scrappers using Selenium for .NET and various data cleaning and formatting techniques to develop a complete alternate medicine dataset for Pakistani products
Implemented manufacturer management module and pharmacy management module using ASP.NET MVC
Developed reverse lookup queries for searching by Brand name, and Generic name
Developed the pharmacy locator module using the Google Maps API to identify the nearest pharmacy to the searching user
